name: Kiprim 393ft Dual Laser Distance Measuring Tool LD120S, 120m Total Range, Electronic Level, Precise Measurements, and Pythagorean Function - Ideal for Construction, DIY, and Home Renovation
short_description: Dual Laser Heads for Faster Measurements: Measure in two directions at once, saving time and effort on complex tasks.Laser class: class II, power output <1mv.
393ft Total Range for Versatile Projects: Covers up to 196ft in each direction, perfect for home renovations, office layouts, and construction projects.
Electronic Level for Flawless Accuracy: Ensures perfectly aligned measurements, avoiding costly mistakes during installations or alignments.
Accurate to ±2mm for Professional Results: Get precise measurements every time, whether it’s for cutting materials or planning layouts.
Simplifies Complex Calculations: Instantly calculate area, volume, or distances using Pythagorean functions—no manual math needed.
Easy-to-read Display, even in dim light: Bright LCD screen ensures clarity, so you can work comfortably in any environment.
Lightweight and Compact for One-handed Use: Ergonomic design reduces fatigue, making it easy to handle during long projects.
Rechargeable Battery Saves Money: Avoid frequent battery replacements—one charge powers up to 3000 dual-laser measurements.
Stores up to 30 Measurements for Quick Reference: Keep your project data organized and accessible at all times.
Switchable Units for Global Usability: Choose between meters, feet, and inches to suit your preferred system or project requirements.

name: Fanttik A10 Pro 2-in-1 Digital Laser Tape Measure with HD IPS Color Display, 165Ft Rechargeable Laser Measurement Tool & 9.8Ft Measuring Tape, 6 Units Selectable, for Distance/Area/Volume
short_description: 2-in-1 Digital Tape & Laser Measuring Tool: The A10 Pro combines a 9.8Ft tape measure for precise detail work with a 165Ft laser distance measurer to easily cover large spaces. Its smart dual-mode switching adapts seamlessly to both indoor and outdoor scenarios. Whether you prefer the precise feel of a traditional tape or the convenience and efficiency of laser measurement, the A10 Pro meets your needs—with an innovative design that fits your usage habits

HD IPS Color Display: No more squinting in sunlight! A10 Pro features a 1.47-inch IPS color screen (500nit adjustable brightness, 172×320 resolution) that shows tape and laser measurements simultaneously. Even in bright outdoor light, data stays clear—unlike low-brightness LCDs that show only one measurement. Greatly improves efficiency

High-Precision Measurement Tech: The A10 Pro features a digital tape measure and angle measurement—functions rarely found in similar tools. Suitable for high-precision professional tasks, it eliminates manual reading errors for easier, more reliable measurement. It delivers laser distance accuracy of ±1/8 inch, digital tape accuracy of ±1/16 inch, and dual-axis electronic angle accuracy of ±1°, ensuring professional results every time

6 Units + 3 Modes + 3 References: The A 10 Pro supports 6 units (Ft/Ft+in/in/M/CM/mm), 3 modes (distance/area/volume), and 3 reference points (front/rear/screw hole). Its tripod-compatible design ensures stable projection and high-altitude positioning, delivering precise measurements in corners, ceilings, and other complex scenarios with flexible operation

Type-C Charging & 30 Data Slots: The A10 Pro offers 30 built-in slots for quick access to past measurements. A hidden Type-C port and a battery lasting 5,000+ uses per charge keep you powered through long days. One charge, seamless performance—no swaps, no distractions

name: CRAFTSMAN 55 ft. Pocket Laser Distance Measurer (CMHT77721)
short_description: EXTENDED RANGE: Up to 55 ft. maximum range for performance and versatility
RECHARGEABLE: Lithium Ion battery and included USB cable for rechargeable convenience
SIMPLE, INTUITIVE DESIGN: One-button operation for product simplicity
LCD BACKLIT DISPLAY: For easy and readability of on-screen measurements
COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Designed with the user in mind for convenient storage and transport
Laser Class 2, <=1.5mW @ 510-530nm
product_description: With a slim and compact design you'll be able to carry this 55 ft. Pocket Laser Distance Measurer around your home or job site with ease. One-button operation makes it easy to use and change between measurement units. The backlit LCD screen provides user readability so the measurements you take are visible. Use this Pocket Laser Distance Measurer for a wide range of applications from electrical and plumbing to basic home measurements. Its sturdy build and rechargeable battery make it a great addition to your CRAFTSMAN tools.

name: Leica Geosystems DISTO D2 New 330ft Laser Distance Measure with Bluetooth 4.0, Black/Red, 1.7 x 1 x 4.6 inches
short_description: This unit contains a Class II Laser with 1mW output
1/16" accuracy and up to 330 foot measuring range. Measuring units-0.000 m, 0.00 ft, 0'00" 1/16, 0 in 1/16. Measurements per set of batteries-up to 10000
Bluetooth 4.0 for transferring measurements into desired software
Last 10 measurement memory, Dimensions : 116 x 44 x 26 mm / 4.57 x 1.73 x 1.02 in
Pythagoras function for indirect height or width measurements. Operating temperature range:14°F to 122°F / -10°C to 50°C.Protection class:IP 54, dust & splash protected
Intelligent automatic end piece for hard to reach corners
product_description: Our newest take on the classic Leica DISTO D2. Now with Bluetooth, a fully integrated intelligent end piece, a bright white display and an ISO Certified measuring engine that drives 1/16" accuracy and 330 foot measuring range. The Leica DISTO D2 new is a 7 measurement mode LDM accurate to 1/16 of an inch. It features an intuitive back-lit LCD display in a 4oz package that is small enough to fit in your pocket. Flip out the intelligent end piece to 90º to hook onto outside corners or extend the end piece fully for inside corners. The D2 new will automatically measure from the end of its flip-out end piece when fully extended. Combined with the Min/max function, the end piece allows you to get the tool all the way into corners for accurate Diagonal measurements. The D2 new calculates area and volume and remembers the last 10 measurements taken. The D2 new includes a Pythagoras function for indirect height or width measurements. This unit contains a class II laser with 1Mw output.

name: 656ft/200M Dual Laser Distance Measuring Tool, Huepar Professional Rechargeable Digital Laser Room Measure Devices, Bilateral Metro Laser Measurement Tool with with Angle Sensor, Magnetic Back
short_description: 【Ultra-Long 656FT Laser Measurement – Fast & Accurate】This dual-head laser distance meter supports bidirectional & unidirectional measurement modes, allowing seamless switching for different tasks. The adjustable reference enhances precision, eliminating constant repositioning. With a maximum range of 656FT (200M) and ±1/8 inch (2mm) accuracy, it’s perfect for construction, surveying, and renovations

【Type-C Fast Charging & Extended Battery Life】Powered by a 3.7V 850mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery, this laser measuring tool fully charges in 1.5 hours and provides up to 5 hours of continuous use. The USB-C port ensures fast, convenient charging on the go. Easily monitor battery levels on the high-visibility LCD display, keeping you powered for demanding jobs

【9-in-1 Multifunctional Measuring Tool】This advanced laser measurer offers 9 measurement modes, including length, area, volume, angle, wall area, and 4 Pythagorean modes. It features unit switching (M/In/Ft/Ft+In), 100 data storage groups, and addition/subtraction functions. The continuous measurement mode allows easy determination of midpoint, max, and min values, making it ideal for real estate, engineering, and home improvement

【Auto-Rotating LCD & Screen Lock for Convenience】The smart LCD screen automatically rotates, ensuring clear visibility from any angle. The screen lock feature prevents accidental changes, making this an excellent alternative to traditional laser tape measures. Perfect for contractors, electricians, carpenters, and DIY enthusiasts, enhancing accuracy and efficiency on every job

【What’s in the Box?】 ✔ 1 × 656FT (200M) Dual-Head Laser Distance Meter ✔ 1 × Auxiliary Measuring Board ✔ 1 × USB-C Charging Cable ✔ 1 × User Manual ✔ 1 × Hand Strap & Carrying Case ✔ 2-Year Warranty for Hassle-Free Support
Indoor or outdoor cloudy day use, not for outdoor sunny day

name: PREXISO Mini Laser Measurement Tool, 135Ft Rechargeable Laser Distance Meter Ft/Ft+in/in/M Unit, Laser Measure with High Accuracy, Pythagorean, Distance, Area, Volume Modes
short_description: TIPS: If the Screen Does Not Light Up, Please Charge the Item First

Mini Size: 1/3 volume of normal laser distance measure, made of ABS material, small body and compact mode fits in hand perfectly, provides comfortable grip and gives you convenient operation. With a hand strap, you can put it in your pocket or carry it everywhere

High Accuracy: Measuring range ups to 135 feet to meet your regular measuring need, ideal for home, construction and industries; Using ASIC chip with High Accuracy: ±1/8 inch; Hold the UNITS button 3s to switch units among Ft/ Ft+In/ In/ M freely; Press UNITS to change measure reference while measuring. It is recommended to be used Indoor; Laser: Class 2, <1mW

Multifunctional Measurement: There are 6 laser measure modes of our mini laser include Distance, Continuous, Area, Volume, Pythagorean Method-two Points and Pythagorean Method-three Points meeting your different needs, Calibration, Reference Change and Automatic shutdown without operation for 120s also assures you an easy and quick measurement to improve efficiency

Rechargeable Battery: Digital laser measure equipped with Li-ion rechargeable battery and USB changing, you don’t need to replace batteries frequently, more environmental and energy-saving, 3-5 hours long battery lasting. TIPS: Please charge before use
Package Contents: Prexiso Mini Laser Measuring Device 135Ft (contains Li-ion battery); USB charging; User Manual; Hand Strap; Package Box. Can be an ideal holidays’ gift for your family or friends

name: ACEGMET Laser Measure, 229ft/70m Laser Measurement Tool, S9 Room Laser Measuring Tool with 2 Bubble Levels, LCD Backlit Display, IP54 Waterproof, Pythagorean Mode for Distance, Area, Volume
short_description: Precision at Your Fingertips: ACEGMET laser measure delivers exact measurements with just one tap—effortlessly accurate for DIY projects and professional use

Precision & Speed: Equipped with 2 bubble levels, the ACEGMET Laser Measuring Tool ensures accuracy up to ±1/16 inch and measures distances up to 229 feet (70 meters). In just 0.5 seconds, most measurements get done with this laser measure

4 Multiple Measurement Modes: ACEGMET laser measure features versatile modes including angle, area, distance, volume, and Pythagorean calculations. Simply point and let it handle the calculations for you

Rugged & Portable Design: The ACEGMET Laser Measuring Tool features an IP54 protection rating, adding confidence for use in dusty or slightly wet conditions. Its compact design ensures lightweight and easy portability without compromising quality

Large Backlit LCD Screen: The ACEGMET laser measure features a 2-inch backlit LCD screen for clear visibility in low light. The bright, clear display allows for quick and easy readouts, whether indoors or outdoors, whether reading from the front or the back

Quiet Operation: The S9 laser measuring tool features a mute setting, allowing you to turn the beep on or off at your will. Use it discreetly in quiet environments like libraries, offices, or classrooms
Greening Our Footprint: When you purchase from ACEGMET, we will be donating part of our profit to help grow more trees, support sustainability, and build a greener planet

name: Huepar Dual Laser Measuring Tool, 393Ft Green-Beam Bilateral Digital Laser Distance Measure 6 Units Ft/in/M, Rechargeable Laser Measurement Tool -Backlit LCD Display, Length/Area/Volume/Angle Sensor
short_description: 【High Efficiency Dual Measurement Tool】Bilateral laser measure can do two-direction measurements simultaneously. Measure reference can be adjusted to get bidirectional/unidirectional measurements for different measure needs. No need to move the medidor laser measuring tool frequently, greatly improves efficiency and saves time. Max bidirectional measure distance up to 393Ft, unidirectional measure distance up to 196Ft, ±1/16 inch high accuracy. A good choice for replacing the laser tape measure.

【Green-Beam Laser & LCD Display】The laser distance measuring tool generates green-beam point up to 4 times brighter than the standard red-beam laser measures. With high visibility green points/dots, measuring in low light or no light becomes easy one-man task. Safety Laser Class II, <1mW power output. The clearly visible backlit LCD screen displays data in distinct resolution, allowing work in low-light or no-light conditions. LCD screen supports 4-direction automatic rotation and locking.

【9 Measure Modes & Multiple Functions】This digital room measuring device provides 9 measurement modes -Distance/Area/Volume/Angle/Wall area, and 4 pythagorean modes, which can meet your various measurement needs in different scenarios. Switchable M/In/Ft/Ft+In units, 100 groups of data can be stored for retrieval, with addition and subtraction mode for data calculation effectively, self calibration mode. You can also get the midpoint, max, and min value easily by continuous measuring mode.

【Rechargeable Battery & Electronic Angle Sensor】Our bilateral laser measurer has a built-in 3.7V 850mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery. It takes about 1.5 hours to fully charge by type-C charging cord and lasts about 5 hours. No need to replace the battery frequently making your work more efficiently. With electronic angular sensor, the laser distance meter delivers higher accuracy and faster angle measurements compared to bubble level meters. You can quickly determine the horizontal direction.

【More Features & What You Get】The laser distance measure is IP54 Rating. 1/4" threaded mount on the back enables it to be attached to tripod for use. With back magnetic suction, you can fix the laser distance meters to metal surfaces to avoid moving around when making measurements. You will get: 2 years after sell service, 1 x bilateral green laser measuring tool, 1 x Auxiliary measuring plate, 1 x ‎Type-C cord, 1 x Hand strap, 1 x Carrying bag, 1 x User manual.

name: Laser Measure 328 Ft Digital Laser Distance Meter Measurement with 2 Bubble Levels，99 Sets Data Storage, M/in/Ft Unit Switching, IP54 and Multiple Functions Laser Measuring Tool.
short_description: 【Accurate & Reliable 】 The measuring distance of this laser distance meter extends to 328 ft; With laser precision technology, the measurement accuracy ups to ±1/16 inch(±2mm). Before each laser measure leaves the factory, we test the accuracy at different distances over at least 3 times to ensure the accuracy of each laser measure. Switchable among M/In/Ft for free adjustment. Auto shut down after 150s without any operation to save the power of the laser measuring tool.

【Large backlight screen & High quality material】 The 2 in large screen makes laser measurement tool easy to see the readings. The orange color stands out in your tool bag and it helps you easy to find it compared to black color. The digital laser distance is sturdy and durable, because the plastic is made of environmentally friendly and durable PP material. The laser meter is ideal for home, construction and industries, especially in large areas such as rooms, apartments, buildings, factories.

【Multiple functions & 99 groups data memory】 There are multiple functions, including single and continuous measuring, area measuring, volume measuring, Pythagorean measuring, addition and subtraction, record function. Mute setting allows you turn on or off the measure beep at your will, suitable for using in library, classroom and the other quite places. 99 groups data memory help you record the entire measurement process, it helps you retrieve the measurement data conveniently.

【Easy to use】 Just press a button to start measuring. The lightweight and easy-to-carry design is very suitable for professionals and DIY enthusiasts. The wrist strap lets you hold the meter steady and carry easily. Unique 2 bubble levels and automatic calibration ensure the meter is balanced for accurate measurements in any situation.

【Customer Service】 Sanliang strives to create professional and high-quality tools. We promise that we will test the accuracy of every one to ensure you will get the excellent products. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, our professional after-sales team will solve your problem in time.

Class II laser product, output < 1mW
